title: The Biden Economists Who Don’t Buy the Biden Inflation Message
body:
President Joe Biden often likes to pretend that the entire economics profession is unified in support of his policies. A Washington Post report suggests that on the country’s most important economic issue, Mr. Biden hasn’t even entirely won over his own staff.
“White House economists push back against pressure to blame corporate power for inflation” reads the headline on today’s Post story from Jeff Stein. Isn’t it nice to know that there are still a few residents of the D.C. swamp who maintain their professional integrity? Mr. Stein reports:
